trans-unit.source: Represents the <xref uid="langword_csharp_choice" name="choice" href=""></xref> element (compositor) from the XML Schema as specified by the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C).
The <xref uid="langword_csharp_choice" name="choice" href=""></xref> allows only one of its children to appear in an instance.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaChoice"></xref> class.

Gets the collection of the elements contained with the compositor (<xref uid="langword_csharp_choice" name="choice" href=""></xref>): <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlSchemaElement" name="XmlSchemaElement" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlSchemaGroupRef" name="XmlSchemaGroupRef" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlSchemaChoice" name="XmlSchemaChoice" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlSchemaSequence" name="XmlSchemaSequence" href=""></xref>, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlSchemaAny" name="XmlSchemaAny" href=""></xref>.
The collection of elements contained within <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlSchemaChoice" name="XmlSchemaChoice" href=""></xref>.
